title: Bug 116829: Label height not changing with label font modification
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label height does not change immediately.
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Add a label.
2. Edit the font size of the label to be 18 points.
OB: The label height does not change after modifying the font size in the UI.
EB: The label height should adjust to accommodate the new font size.
SR:
1. Add a label.
2. Modify the font size of the label to be 18 points.
3. Observe that the label height does not adjust accordingly.
